item.description:
Find me under three shiny BLUE STAR-shaped Balloons on the Green.

As the concert ("Little Big Band") winds down before dark ... zip over the town line to Meriden's Hubbard Park FIREWORKS display just a few miles away!

We had a mixed group of @ 20 for the Manchester Fireworks display from multiple MeetUp groups , plus the "Single Event" - old and new friends coming together! C'mon New Haven County - meet new friends!

We'll also be gathering for East Hartford's "RiverFest" this coming Saturday, 07/07. See that posting.

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: 1of2: Big Band Hits
